3.75m Inflatable Centrifuge

Compatibility: 0.24.2 Version: 0.2 Beta Updated: 26 Aug., 2014

Javascript is disabled. View full album

What it does:

When deflated, this module has a 3.75m factory form and can hold no crew. Expanded, this module is 10m and can provide living and working space for a crew of 20. Additionally, the unit can be set to rotate independent of its parent ship, providing a comfortable 1g for it's occupants.

This is really easy to fix, I had the same problem. Go into the .cfg text file for the part in gamedata. It should be under GameData/ChromaWorks/parts/375mhub/part. Near the Top of the .cfg text file for the part is this:

"model = ChromaWorks/Parts/375mHub/meshscale = 2.0, 2.0, 2.0"

Change "Scale = 2.0, 2.0, 2.0" to "Scale = 1.0, 1.0, 1.0" and your part should be the correct size in .25.
